casebody.data:
Monday, December 13, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2110. Leisure v. State Farm Auto. Ins. Co.

Stark App. Nos. 1997CA00417 and 1998CA00001. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Stark County.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, suei sponte, that oral argument scheduled for December 14, 1999, be continued until further order of the court.
